input_text:
Job Title: Maintenance Mechanic

Location: Lima, NY

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Are you a hands-on problem solver with a passion for keeping things running smoothly? We're on the lookout for a Maintenance Mechanic to join our team and play a vital role in maintaining our production machinery & facilities. Based in Lima, NY, Lakelands offers a comprehensive range of architectural and precast concrete products and services tailored to meet the diverse needs of our clients
Responsibilities:Performs scheduled maintenance of production equipment during preventive service.Provides emergency/unscheduled repairs of production equipment during production.Performs maintenance & repair duties including, but not limited to, mechanical, electrical, pneumatic, and hydraulic troubleshooting of production machines.Reads and interprets equipment manuals and work orders to perform required maintenance and service.Building maintenance duties as assigned including lighting fixture maintenance.Comply with OSHA safety and health rules.Daily clean-up of work area.Maintenance mechanics also support the building of metal and wood forms as needed.All other duties as assigned
Required experience: 2+ years of related maintenance experience in a production facility. HS Diploma or GED
Preferred skills & Experience: A.S in Industrial Maintenance, other relevant degree program OR related trade school program/certification.
Why Lakelands?We ensure you and your families are provided with competitive benefits:
 · Medical Insurance· Prescription Drug Coverage· Dental Insurance Coverage · Vision Insurance Coverage· Health Savings Account· Health Reimbursement Account· Life Insurance· Long-Term Disability Plan
We care about your health:· Telemedicine· Free Preventive Care
We care about your safety:· Safety Training Programs· Maintaining a Clean and Environmentally Safe Facility
We care about your future:· 401k Plan· Profit Sharing Plan· Professional Financial Advisor· On-the-job Training and Development Opportunities
We care about your life outside of work:· Generous Paid Time Off· Bereavement Pay· Paid Family Leave· Retirement Planning Assistance
 For information on Lakelands Concrete including more information on the team and our company culture, visit our website at https://www.lakelandsconcrete.com/. All applicants will receive an acknowledgement that their application has been received. Those candidates selected for further consideration will be contacted within five (5) business days.
Affirmative Action/EEO statementLakelands Concrete Products provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment and prohibits discrimination and harassment of any type without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, national origin, disability status, genetics, protected veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state or local laws. 
This policy applies to all terms and conditions of employment, including recruiting, hiring, placement, promotion, termination, layoff, recall, transfer, leaves of absence, compensation, and training. Rev. 02/2024.

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: Maintenance Mechanic
output_json.summary: Hands-on problem solver with a passion for maintaining production machinery & facilities.
job_responsibilities: Performs scheduled maintenance of production equipment during preventive service.
Provides emergency/unscheduled repairs of production equipment during production.
Performs maintenance & repair duties including, but not limited to, mechanical, electrical, pneumatic, and hydraulic troubleshooting of production machines.
Reads and interprets equipment manuals and work orders to perform required maintenance and service.
Building maintenance duties as assigned including lighting fixture maintenance.
Comply with OSHA safety and health rules.
Maintenance mechanics also support the building of metal and wood forms as needed.
benefits: Maintaining a Clean and Environmentally Safe Facility
output_json.equal_opportunity_policy: Lakelands Concrete Products provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment and prohibits discrimination and harassment of any type without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, national origin, disability status, genetics, protected veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state or local laws.

other.content: All applicants will receive an acknowledgement that their application has been received. Those candidates selected for further consideration will be contacted within five (5) business days.
